title: Hrishikesh Hirway from The One AM Radio and Song Exploder
itunes:title: Hrishikesh Hirway from The One AM Radio and Song Exploder
description:
Today on the show is Hrishikesh Hirway from the band The One AM Radio and Song Exploder which is an amazing podcast you all should be listening to. I visited him at his house in Los Angeles to discuss being a nerd, choosing your own path and how he got the podcast off of the ground. I would encourage anyone who is trying to build anything to check this episode out. Please donate to the show!Visit the Show Website!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
